sentences.en: A long time illness made him sallow and emaciated.
sentences.cn: 长期患病使他面黄肌瘦.

sentences.en: He was trembling, his sallow face flushed an ugly dark red.
sentences.cn: 他在发抖, 他苍白的脸发出难看的黑红色.

sentences.en: Her complexion was sallow ; and her features small, without beauty.
sentences.cn: 她皮肤病黄, 五官细小, 毫无风韵可言.

sentences.en: Her face looked sallow and swollen in the dreary light.
sentences.cn: 在昏暗的光线中看上去她那蜡黄的脸有些浮肿.

sentences.en: Her sallow skin was drawn tightly across the bones of her face.
sentences.cn: 她那蜡黄的皮肤紧紧地包着脸上的骨头。

sentences.en: His complexion was sallow, his face swollen.
sentences.cn: 他面呈菜色, 脸部浮肿.

sentences.en: His face was sallow and shiny with sweat.
His long, sallow face deeply lined.
sentences.cn: 他黄黄的长脸上皱纹很深.

sentences.en: I am not bad looking if my skin were not so sallow.
sentences.cn: 我并不难看,如果我的皮肤不是灰黄的话.

sentences.en: She had lank hair and sallow skin.
She looks wan, sallow and miserable , she's probably had some bad luck.
sentences.cn: 她面容憔悴, 目光凄楚, 大概是遇到了不幸的事.

sentences.en: The girl's face looks wan and sallow, and her eyelids are swollen.
sentences.cn: 姑娘脸色憔悴, 眼皮浮肿.

sentences.en: There was a dark oily gleam in his sallow face.
sentences.cn: 他的脸上的青黄色里,映射着一层暗的油光.

sentences.en: They have dark hair, sallow skin and grey green eyes.
sentences.cn: 他们黑头发, 黄皮肤,灰绿色的眼睛.

sentences.en: You will become sallow and hollow - cheeked, and dull - eyed.
sentences.cn: 你会变得面如土色,两颊凹陷 、 眼光迟滞.

trans.tran_en: sallow skin looks slightly yellow and unhealthy

trans.tran_cn: 黄华柳，山毛柳，黄华柳细枝，黄华柳木
